Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue/Monument Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Melbourne Avenue and Monument Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: The great Allakaren Circle lies to the east along Monument Avenue. The Circle hold the strange, Tree of Life, that has been in existance for as long as anyone can remember. Allakaren Circle is named after the Allakaren Pyramid, both of which have withstood the tests of time. On all sides of the road, there are a number of small shops and other facilities to pass the time.
